name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Solomon A. MURRAY, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Solomon A. MURRAY, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Frederic G. Antoun, Jr., Asst. Public Defender, Harrisburg, for appellant.
LeRoy S. Zimmerman, Dist. Atty., Marion E. MacIntyre, Second Asst. Dist. Atty., Peter J. Anderson, Deputy Dist. Atty., Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
374 A.2d 534
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Solomon A. MURRAY, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 27, 1977.
Decided June 22, 1977.
Frederic G. Antoun, Jr., Asst. Public Defender, Harrisburg, for appellant.
LeRoy S. Zimmerman, Dist. Atty., Marion E. MacIntyre, Second Asst. Dist. Atty., Peter J. Anderson, Deputy Dist. Atty., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
